name: DeleteBoxHub
description:
Delete a specific Box Hub using its ID.

This tool is used to delete a specific Box Hub by providing its unique hub ID. It should be called when a user wants to remove a particular hub from the Box service.

parameters.name: box_hub_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a Box Hub, obtainable from the hub's URL.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a hub.

The ID for any hub can be determined
by visiting this hub in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/hubs/123`
the `hub_id` is `123`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: hub_id
parameters.description:
The unique identifier that represent a hub.

The ID for any hub can be determined
by visiting this hub in the web application

for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/hubs/123`
the `hub_id` is `123`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
